Hi Guys/Gals,
A recent purchase of a very nice item is nudging me to sell off some 
of my swords and fittings.

I have just listed a top quality sword in very beautifal and near 
perfect mounts. It has been totally restored in Japan and is a very 
nice package to say the least.

I had it listed on my site for $6500.00, I lowered the buy it now to 
around $4900.00 on ebay.

Here is the link: 

http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=6525520571

Free shipping in North America, and a discount on shipping to 
anywhere else.

Thanks for looking.

Louis Skebo
www.japaneseswordcollector.com
